title: Doro Doro Obake Ouji-sama - Novel Updates
tags: Bickering Couple   Broken Engagement   Childhood Friends   Curses   Female Protagonist   Paizuri   R-18   Royalty   Tsundere
author: Koshu
description:
The Second Prince who was my fiancé got another girl pregnant. Along with much fuss, I’ll marry my childhood friend the Third Prince!

But he seems to be under a curse.

Mud Monster, I’ve heard of it as so, but n～ He’s more human than I expected?

Not capitalizing on the serious setting at all, it’s just a story about a high tension heroine and a slightly S hero flirting while lifting the curse.>
